name: FC Bayern 23/24 Home jersey
description: Cut for a close fit, the jersey is crafted entirely from 100% recycled polyester double knit and finished with a premium ribbed crewneck. Behind the scenes, moisture-wicking AEROREADY fabric helps to keep you feeling comfortable whether you're headed for the grandstands or the pitch.

name: Real Madrid 23/24 Home jersey
description: With a nod to older kits, gold details are re-introduced and emphasized by elegant navy framing. An allover print is a subtle update to the classic white color, complemented by a 'designed-for-fans' approach that keeps the fit and feel ready for stylish everyday wear.

name: Manchester Utd 23/23 Home Jersey
description: The jersey forms a cast iron link to Manchester's enduring influence around the globe. Taking design elements from a nearby Industrial Revolution-era bridge, it displays a repeating Lancashire Rose-inspired geometric pattern on the front.

name: Arsenal FC 23/24 Home Jersey
description: The Arsenal 23/24 Home Jersey celebrates the team's unique anniversary with lightning bolts and gold details. Created for loyal club supporters, the jersey features sweat-wicking AEROREADY technology to keep you feeling dry,while a woven badge shows off your team pride.

name: Liverpool FC 23/24 Home Jersey
description: The Liverpool 23/24 Home Jersey pays homage to the club's rich history with iconic details. Featuring the famous Liver Bird crest, this jersey is crafted for comfort with breathable fabric and a stylish design.

name: Manchester City 23/24 Home Jersey
description: The Manchester City 23/24 Home Jersey showcases the team's modern style with bold colors and a sleek design. Built for performance, it features moisture-wicking technology to keep you cool on and off the pitch.

name: Paris Saint-Germain (PSG) 23/24 Home Jersey
description: The PSG 23/24 Home Jersey combines elegance with the club's rich heritage. Featuring the iconic Eiffel Tower logo, this jersey is a symbol of Parisian pride. It offers a comfortable fit for supporters and players alike.

name: Borussia Dortmund 23/24 Home Jersey
description: The Borussia Dortmund 23/24 Home Jersey represents the club's vibrant energy with a bold design. Inspired by the city's cultural scene, it features eye-catching patterns and is crafted for maximum comfort during matches.

name: Chelsea FC 23/24 Home Jersey
description: The Chelsea FC 23/24 Home Jersey celebrates the club's success with a sleek and stylish design. Featuring the iconic blue color, this jersey is perfect for Chelsea fans who want to showcase their team pride.

name: Inter Miami CF 23/24 Home Jersey
description: The Inter Miami CF 23/24 Home Jersey captures the essence of Miami's vibrant culture. With bold colors and a modern design, this jersey is a must-have for fans who want to stand out in the crowd.

name: Tottenham Hotspur 23/24 Home Jersey
description: The Tottenham Hotspur 23/24 Home Jersey represents the club's rich history with a classic design. Featuring the iconic cockerel crest, this jersey is a symbol of pride for Spurs supporters.

name: FC Barcelona 23/24 Home Jersey
description: The FC Barcelona 23/24 Home Jersey showcases the club's iconic colors with a modern twist. With the famous Barça crest and bold design, this jersey is a testament to the club's legacy and success.
